means: 耍花招哄骗别人（尤指于法律事务中）

sentence.Network_en: We still do; living in a world in which underclared aggression, war, hypocrisy, chicanery, anarchy and impending immolation are part of our daily lives, we all want a code to live by.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们仍然有这种感觉; 生活在一个不宣而战的侵略 、 战争 、 虚伪 、 诈骗 、 混乱以及迫在眉睫的杀戮充斥着我们日常生活的世界里, 我们都想有一种能赖以生存的准则.

sentence.Network_en: The world is full of chicanery.
Why are you give me so much chicanery as a explanation?
sentence.Network_cn: 你为什么给我那么多狡辩的解释?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... fishery 渔场 chicanery 诈骗 refinery 炼油厂.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... chef 厨师 chicanery 诡计，狡诈 chide 叱责，指责.
英语专业专业八级核心词汇_百度文库 ... charlatan n 吹牛者 chicanery n 强辩强词夺理狡辩欺骗 chimerical adj 空想的.
英语专业专业八级核心词汇_百度文库 ... charlatan n 吹牛者 chicanery n 强辩强词夺理狡辩欺骗 chimerical adj 空想的.

list.abs: meanwhile , all manner of budgeting chicanery is being used to reduce the apparent cost and keep the CBO " score " to below $ 900 billion .同时，为了减少显性开销而保持CBO的“打分”在9000亿美元的预算编制花招都用尽了。
Why are you give me so much chicanery as a explanation ?, 你为什么给我那么多狡辩的解释?

Germany's economic machine is made of honest iron and steel , not subprime mortgages , collateralized debt obligations and other Cheap The Chronicles of Spellborn Gold financial chicanery .德国的经济机器是踏踏实实地用钢和铁做成的，而不是次级房屋抵押贷款、担保债务凭证和其他金融欺诈。
in late January came the arrest of Takafumi Horie , the brash head of livedoor , an acquisitive internet group , suspected of financial chicanery .在一月底，靠四处收购兼并而发迹的互联网集团——活力门，不可一世的总裁堀江贵文因涉嫌金融诈骗而被捕。
to resort to tricks or subterfuges ; use chicanery对…施用诡计或玩花招；用圈套

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French chicanerie, from chicaner 'to quibble' (see chicane)

entry.def: Chicanery is using cleverness to cheat people.

means.word_mean: 1. the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)

auth_sentence.content: Not, however, without engaging in some more diplomatic chicanery.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not, however, without engaging in some more diplomatic chicanery.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not, however, without engaging in some more diplomatic chicanery.

auth_sentence.content: But underlying all the chicanery beats a heart of pure chart gold.
auth_sentence.res_content: But underlying all the chicanery beats a heart of pure chart gold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But underlying all the chicanery beats a heart of pure chart gold.

auth_sentence.content: This is chicanery not science. This is imagination run wild not science.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is chicanery not science. This is imagination run wild not science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is chicanery not science. This is imagination run wild not science.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
nurse养育,护理+ery场所,地点→nursery托儿所
